K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:1b-1: a'arya ku su ma sanytsa ya n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:2b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs su bye ba brgya phrag stong gi'ang tha ma na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mar me can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:2b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:3a-3: bskal pa drug cur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:3a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams mar me can gyi mi'i nyi ma sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de'i mtshan thos par dga' ba ni bskal pa drug cur 'khor bar mi 'gyur ro; ;sh'a ri'i bu; de la sogs pa shar phyogs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi mtshan rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:3b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dam pa zhes bya ba @3b bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:3b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dam pa'i mtshan gang dag nyan par 'gyur ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:3b-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la nyin gcig bzhin du sbyin pa phul ba de bzhin du bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du phul ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po des bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:3b-9: dper ram; rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:3b-10: de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa na sangs rgyas rin chen dam pa gtso bo bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:3b-11: de'i mtshan thos pas 'dir sangs rgyas 'byung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:3b-12: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag drug cu na 'jig rten gyi khams spos ldan zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:4a-0: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi'ang tha ma na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa @4a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:4a-9: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gnyis kyi ches pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen rab snang zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:4a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rab snang gi mtshan gang dag thos pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:4b-0: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi @4b zhing stong bas ches ring ba 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te; yang sh'a ri'i bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:4b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa de'i mtshan gang dag thos pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:4b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa de'i mtshan dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:5a-4: yon tan yongs su brjod pas bag tsha zhing yongs su gdungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:5a-5: 'on kyang bdag gis mtshan nyan pa de rnams la bar chad bgyi ba'i slad du go bgo bar bgyi'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:5a-14: de dag ni ngas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa la gtad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:5a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dag la'ang gtad pas /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:6a-1: rab tu zhan pa de 'dra ba dag gis kyang ngas bshad pa'i yon tan khong du chud na gang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pas shes par 'gyur pa lta ci smos /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:6b-16: mi shes pa ni spang bar mi bya ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:7b-2: sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs dpag tu med pa'i dbyangs 'dzin par 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:7b-10: yongs su sgrogs shing 'dzin pa ni bdud sdig can gyis rab tu gdul dka' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:7b-11: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu gnyis na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:8a-1: pa mtha' yas de'i mtshan gang dag nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:8a-2: thal mo sbyor zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags pa mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu smra ba de dag ni bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:8a-3: rin po che'i phung po ri rab dang mnyam pa lo brgyar sbyin pa byin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'dis snga ma de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:8a-4: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag gsum na 'jig rten gyi khams man shel can zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen snang zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:8a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snang 'di'i mtshan gang dag 'dzin pa de dag ni bskal pa bcur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:8a-7: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:8a-8: yang gang dag dad par mi byed pa de dag ni bskal par mtshams med par gnas pa'i las yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:8a-9: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bco lnga na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od gsal zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba chen po thob pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:8b-0: yang sh'a ri'i @8b bu; de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba chen po thob pa'i mtshan gang dag nyan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis sems can thams cad bde bar sgrol bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:8b-1: bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa'ang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:8b-2: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bdun na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu snang ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma mar me snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:8b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma mar me snang ba de'i mtshan gang dag nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:8b-5: dad par gyur pa de dag gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i stobs de dag rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:8b-6: 'di nas sangs rgyas zhing stong phrag brgyad na 'jig rten gyi khams bden ldan zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bden pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:8b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i dbyangs de'i mtshan gang dag nyan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:8b-9: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag nyi shu na 'jig rten gyi khams gser can zhes bya ba na; de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri med mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:9a-0: gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i @9a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:9a-1: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:9a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dri med mtha' yas kyi mtshan nyan cing dad pa'ang skyed par 'gyur ba de dag ni de bas ches bsod nams 'di mang du 'phel lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:9a-3: bsod nams chung ngus ni de bzhin gshegs pa dri med mtha' yas kyi mtshan thos par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:9a-4: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dri med mtha' yas kyi mtshan thos pa de dag ni sangs rgyas gcig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:9a-8: lnga nas bcu'i bar du ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:9a-9: sems can de dag gis ni sangs rgyas brgya la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:9a-10: de dag ni bskal pa lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:9a-11: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag dgu na 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs can zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba ltar dkar ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:9a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba ltar dkar ba'i mtshan gang dag nyan pa de dag thams cad kyi chos dkar po'ang zla ba lta bur 'gyur zhing thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:9b-0: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi tha ma na 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma @9b can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:9b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od kyi mtshan gang dag nyan cing thos nas kyang pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes ched du brjod pa lan gsum du brjod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:9b-3: yang gang dag gis ched du brjod par bya brjod par byed na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:9b-4: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag sum cu na 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:9b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi mtshan lha'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:9b-8: mi gang dag nyan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:9b-9: de dag log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang dogs par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:9b-10: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyis stong lnga brgya na 'jig rten gyi khams bee d'urya'i snang ba can zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dag pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:9b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dag pa'i mtshan lha'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:10a-3: mi ma yin pa gang dag nyan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad mir 'gyur ba 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:10a-5: gti mug kyang yongs su sbyong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:10a-7: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dag pa de'i mtshan thos pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la de dag dad par mi byed cing yid mches pa las byung ba mi dge ba'i las kyis de lta bur ga la 'gyur zhes tshig tu 'ang smras na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:10a-8: lo stong phrag drug cur dmyal ba chen po 'o dod 'bod pa zhes bya bar btso bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:10a-9: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya srid na 'jig rten gyi khams legs par thob pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:10a-11: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od la rjes su dran par byed na de dag thams cad kyi chos dkar po nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:10a-12: bdud kyi sde thams cad kyang rnam par 'jig par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:10a-13: mu stegs gzhan yang pham par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:10a-14: bskal pa sum cur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:10b-0: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag drug cu pas ches ring bar 'jig rten gyi khams byang chub kyi yan lag rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya @10b ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:10b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas kyi mtshan gang dag nyan pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub kyi yan lag 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:10b-3: sems can yang dkon mchog dam pa la 'god par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:10b-4: de dag nyin mtshan du'ang bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:10b-5: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga brgya snyed na 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo can zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i bla ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:10b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i bla ma'i mtshan gang dag nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:10b-8: dad pa'ang skyed pa ni 'jig rten na de dag thams cad pad mo dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:10b-9: dge ba'i chos kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:10b-10: pad mo chu'i nang nas skyes kyang chu mi chags pa bzhin du bskal pa lnga bcu rtsa lngar 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:10b-11: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag stong pas ches ring ba 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:10b-12: gnod pa thams cad las 'das pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yan lag bla ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag bla ma'i mtshan gang dag nyan @11a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11a-1: par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis srid pa'i chu'i rgya mtsho chen po las 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11a-2: gnod pa thams cad las sgrol ba zhes bya bar sgrol bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11a-3: 'jig rten thams cad kyi sbyin gnas su'ang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11a-4: gang dag thos nas dad pa skyed pa de dag thams cad me tog dang 'dra bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11a-5: 'jig rten thams cad kyi slob dpon du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11a-6: mthu bo che'i lus ltar mkhregs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11a-7: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11a-8: yang bud med gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag bla ma'i mtshan nyan cing thos nas kyang dad pa skyed pa ni des bud med las bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11a-10: de bas na rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11a-11: rigs kyi bu mos phan yon 'di dag 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11a-12: sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag gi bla ma'i mtshan mnyan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11a-14: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag nyi shu na 'jig rten gyi khams snying po can zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od dam pa'i mtshan gang dag @11b nyan cing thos nas kyang dad pa skyed pa de dag thams cad kyis 'od 'thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11b-2: stobs rnams kyang rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11b-3: mi 'jigs pa rnams dang; sangs rgyas kyi phan yon rnams kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11b-4: sangs rgyas thams cad la dad par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11b-5: bsod nams rgya chen po'ang bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11b-6: bsod nams chung ngus ni 'di la re bar mi bya ste; de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di 'dra bas rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed nas byang chub par bya ba'i phyir byang chub tu sems skyed par byed pa ni mtshan 'di thos par mi dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11b-7: bskal pa bcu gnyis su 'khor ba la rgyab kyi phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11b-8: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad na 'jig rten gyi khams mu tig gi dra ba yongs su dag pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i mtshan gang dag thos par 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang dad pa rab tu 'thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11b-11: thal mo sbyor bar byed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur zhing de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:11b-12: thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12a-0: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag nyi shu na 'jig rten gyi @12a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12a-1: khams zla ba can zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser ltar snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12a-2: yang sh'a ri'i bu; de bzhin gshegs pa gser ltar snang ba'i mtshan gang dag thos par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad tha na rmi lam na'ang chos kyi rang bzhin mig yor dang 'dra bar rgya cher ston par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12a-3: log par ltung ba'ang mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12a-4: bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12a-5: sems can tshad med pa rnams la'ang bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12a-8: theg pa chen pos kyang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i tha ma na 'jig rten gyi khams me sgron zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'byung gnas kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12a-12: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can gang dag skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12a-13: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi sems can gang dag gis bdag gi ming thos par gyur pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12a-14: de ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12b-0: @12b thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes de snyam du bsams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12b-1: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad na 'jig rten gyi khams sprang rtsi can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i dbang phyug rgyal po de'i mtshan gang dag thos par 'gyur ba ni klu rnams kyis gang gi tshe na grong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12b-4: phyogs su lce 'bab pa de'i tshe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12b-5: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12b-8: bden pa'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i dbang phyug rgyal pos sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na klur gyur pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12b-9: gang klu rnams kyi nyam nga ba las byung ba de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12b-12: klu mang po brgya dang; klu mang po stong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12b-13: klu mang po brgya stong rnams nyam nga ba las thar bar byas pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12b-14: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gnas pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12b-15: yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12b-16: 'jig rten gyis khams gzhan dag tu'ang klu gang dag gis lce 'bebs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12b-17: gnod pa'i ser ba 'bebs par 'gyur ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:12b-21: nad 'og ba gtong ba der bdag gi ming brjod na gnod pa de dag thams cad med par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13a-0: bden pa'i tshig des bde bar @13a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13a-1: gyur cig ces smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13a-4: bden pa'i tshig des sems can de rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'ang bde ba la gzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13a-5: klu rnams lce gtong ba'ang mtshan brjod pa tsam gyis med par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13a-6: klu'i skye gnas de las shi 'phos nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13a-7: gang dag yang mos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13a-8: mngon par dad par byed pa de dag kyang nyin mtshan du bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13a-9: de dag la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnyed dka' ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13a-10: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag stong gi pha rol na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba lta bu zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog thams cad kyi dri'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13a-13: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa me tog thams cad kyi dri'i dbang phyug rgyal po de'i mtshan thos par 'gyur ba de dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13a-15: tshul khrims kyi spos kyi ngad ldang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13a-19: de'i mtshan gang dag thos par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad de dag gis chos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13b-0: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams @13b cad thob pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13b-4: de bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la lhag pa'i bsam pas dad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13b-5: 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dad par byed pa ni don chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13b-6: sems dad pa gcig gis gang 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13b-7: gang 'di 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag gtams pa 'dzin par mdzad pa rnams la gang dag sems dad pa gcig gis thal mo sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13b-8: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu smras nas byams pa la gnas par byed pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13b-9: lhag pa'i bsam pas sems dad na chos 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13b-10: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13b-11: theg pa des 'gro bar 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i yon tan rjes su dran par byas nas bskal pa bcu bzhir 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13b-12: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag nyis stong na 'jig rten gyi khams skar ma'i rgyal po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:13b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas s'a la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa s'a la'i rgyal po'i mtshan gang dag thos nas @14a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14a-1: dad par mi byed cing 'phya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14a-2: sting pa de dag ni lo stong phrag drug cur sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom du btso bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14a-3: ma dad do zhes tshig tu smras pas lo stong phrag bdun du yi dvags me mdag za ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14a-4: 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga bcu rtsa lnga na 'jig rten kyi khams stobs ldan zhes bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon chas nyon mongs pa sel ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon chas nyon mongs pa sel pa'i mtshan gang dag thos par 'gyur ba ni tha na rmi lam gyi tshe na'ang rdo rje lta bur 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14a-9: bdud kyi 'khor gyis gdul dka' bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14a-10: g-yul chen po las kyang sgrol bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14a-11: gang 'di thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang 'thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14a-13: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan dran pa tsam gyis dad pa skyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14a-14: dga' bar byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14a-15: rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa spyod pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14a-16: bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14a-17: mthar phyin par shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14a-18: yang de dag gis byang chub kyi sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14b-0: bdag cag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi @14b ldog par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14b-1: rgya cher sems yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14b-2: gang dag las bdag cag gis mtshan 'di rna lam du grag cing thos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14b-3: dga' ba yang dag par bskyad nas sems can mang po'i don byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gang dag nyan cing thos nas kyang mos par byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ci yod pa de'i phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14b-7: gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rin po ches rab tu gang bar byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14b-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la nyin re zhing sbyin pa phul ba de ltar gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i bskal par phul ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14b-9: mtshan thos pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i cha 'ga' tsam du'ang brjod par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14b-10: gal te la la zhig gis mtshan 'di mnyan par bya'o snyam nas 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te sbyin pa byin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14b-11: de 'ang bsod nams ma byas pas de thos par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14b-13: ji ste bsod nams ma byas par thos par 'gyur na ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14b-15: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14b-16: lha tshe ring po rnams kyis kyang thos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:14b-17: yon tan brjod pa 'di shes par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15a-0: de dag thams cad bsod nams @15a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15a-1: kyi phung po de snyed dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpal ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15a-4: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15a-5: lhag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis mos pa de dag thams cad bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15a-6: de dag ni ngan song gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur te smon lam ci 'dra bar smon lam 'debs pa de 'dra bas sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na med pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15a-9: gang gis mtshan thos pa de dag thams cad theg pa chen po'i bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15a-10: yid bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15a-12: mi'i nang na 'khor ba na'ang smon lam ji ltar btab pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa chen pos yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15a-13: sangs rgyas las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni de lta bu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15a-14: gang dag bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du log par ltung bar 'gyur ba de dag tu 'gro bar mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15a-15: de ltar sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15b-0: mtshams med pa @15b las byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15b-1: 'phags pa la skur pa ma gtogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15b-2: de dag kyang yun ring po 'das nas ji ltar smon lam btab pa bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15b-4: sdig pa'i las thams cad ni mi bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15b-5: yang ngas sdong dum tshig pa la'ang gnod sems bskyed par mi bya na mir gyur pa lta la ci smos zhes bstan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15b-6: de dag la'ang zhe sdang bskyed na sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma'i lus len par 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mos pa dang ba'i rjes su 'brang ba dang ldan pa lta la ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15b-8: gang de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa la zhe sdang skyed pa lta ci smos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15b-9: skyes bu glen pa de dag bskal pa gcig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15b-12: bskal pa brgya'i bar du'ang de dag ldang bar ma mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15b-13: de dag ni bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du'ang de las ldang ba med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15b-14: gang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di la spong ba de dag ni sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro zhes ngas bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:15b-15: gang dag yang gnyis su mi gsung ba'i tshig chos kyi tshul rnam par dag pa la spong bar mi byed pa de dag thams cad kyi phyir mi ldog par byas nas gdod sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur ro zhes de ltar sems bskyed par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16a-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad cu pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i spos kyis bdugs pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom @16a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16a-1: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos dpag med snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16a-3: yang de bzhin gshegs pa spos dpag med snang ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan gang dag thos par 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16a-5: de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16a-6: de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob nas kyang ba spu'i gseb thams cad nas dri yid du 'ong zhing phyogs su snang bar byed pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16a-7: yang shes rab dman pas ni ye shes chen po 'di la smon par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16a-8: gang dag shes rab rgya che ba de dag gis ni mtshan 'di yongs su brjod pa thos nas dad par 'gyur ba de dag ngas mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16a-9: de dag ni sangs rgyas gzhan dag las bskal pa du mar shes rab yang dag par bsgrubs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16a-11: gang dag gis sangs rgyas gzhan dag las chos 'di thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16a-12: de dag lnga brgya'i tha ma la 'di thos na ma dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16a-13: yid mi ches par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16a-14: khong du mi chud par 'gyur ba'i gnas ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16a-16: de dag ni bskal pa bzhi bcu rtsa lngar 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur bas 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16b-0: gang dag 'di la mngon par dad par 'gyur @16b ba de dag ni shes rab zla ba lta bu dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16b-1: de dag lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16b-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco lnga pa 'jig rten gyi khams klu dang ldan pa snang ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i dbyangs de'i mtshan gang dag thos par 'gyur zhing tshul khrims rjes su dran par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16b-7: de dag thams cad dge ba'i chos rnams las mi bskyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16b-8: bskal pa nyi shur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan bud med gang gis thos par 'gyur ba de mtshan 'gyur zhing 'jig rten na mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16b-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum cu pa yang ga ra ba ti'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthu chen po'i brtson 'grus kyis nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen po'i brtson 'grus kyis nges par 'byung ba'i mtshan gang dag nyan cing dad pa'ang skyed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16b-13: bus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:16b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen po'i brtson 'grus nges par 'byung ba de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes thal mo sbyar na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17a-1: ba na tshe rabs gzhan du de dag rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17a-3: mu stegs gzhan du bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17a-4: pha rol rgol ba thams cad la mtshon cha sra bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17a-5: bskal pa nyi shu rtsa lngar 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17a-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzhi bcu pa rgya mtsho rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snying po zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17a-9: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa snying po zil gyis gnon pa de'i mtshan nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17a-10: thos nas kyang dad cing mos pa de dag thams cad snying po la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17a-11: theg pa mchog thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17a-12: 'di ltar chos kyi sbyin pa thob pa dang ldan pa ni nyin mtshan du chos kyi sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17a-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum cu rtsa drug gi pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnga dbyangs rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17a-15: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnga dbyangs rgyal po'i mtshan nyan cing sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnga dbyangs @17b dbyangs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo zhes zer na gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17b-1: rang sangs rgyas la nyin re zhing sbyin pa byin pa de ltar bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung pos ni de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17b-2: dpe'i bar du'ang mi bzod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya lnga bcu'i pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba can zhes bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i bla ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i bla ma zhes bya ba'i mtshan gang dag nyan pa lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17b-10: mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad mi dge ba'i chos kyis mi gos shing 'jig rten na padma lta bur 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17b-11: gal te bud med nyan par byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17b-13: lhag pa'i bsam pas mos par byed na de'i bud med kyi lus kyi mtha' mar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17b-14: gang dag yid mi ches shing yongs su spong na de dag sangs rgyas kyi stobs spangs par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17b-15: bskal pa nyi shu tshang bar mtshams med pa'i dmyal ba chen por btso bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:17b-17: gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid la yid ches pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18a-0: mos par byed na de nyid kyis bskal pa @18a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18a-1: bcu dgur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong phrag gsum gyi pha rol na 'jig rten gyis khams tsandan gyi ka ba rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18a-4: yang sh'a ri'i bu; gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa me tog zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18a-6: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mi khom pa brgyad po thams cad 'byung bar ma gyur cig ces ji ltar smon lam btab pa bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18a-8: sangs rgyas de'i zhing gi sems can rnams shin tu bde ba dang ldan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18a-10: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyan cing dad pa'ang skyed par byed pa ni 'jig rten na ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18a-11: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na'ang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18a-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi khom pa brgyad med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18a-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong phrag gnyis kyi pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams dzambu'i chu bo rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa @18b yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18b-1: 'jig rten gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18b-3: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi sgron ma'i mtshan nyan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18b-4: mtshams med pa'i las byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18b-5: 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa ma gtogs par de dag thams cad ngan song gi gzhi las thar bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18b-6: dkon mchog dam pa 'thob pa'i rgyur yang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18b-7: gang dag mtshams med pa'i las byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18b-8: 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pas thos na'ang de dag kyang de'i las zad nas mthar gyis sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18b-9: bskal pa nyi shur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18b-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong phrag brgyad 'das pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18b-12: 'jig rten gyi khams 'od gsal zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18b-15: ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 'od gsal zhes bya zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18b-16: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad lag mthil ltar mnyam la padmo ltar snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18b-18: 'jig rten gyi khams de na'ang mun pa'i nang na me'i phung po ltar gzi brjid 'bar zhing lham me /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:18b-20: lhang nges zhing chos ston pas stong sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:19a-1: gang yang 'di stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi spang leb kyis g-yogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:19a-2: shing thams cad gos kyis brgyan nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du grangs med pa la nyin re zhing sbyin pa 'bul zhing de bzhin du bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du mnyam par phul ba bas; gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos na de'i bsod nams kyi phung po de la bsod nams kyi phung po 'dis brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du'ang nye par mi 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:19a-3: gang dag thos nas dga' ba rnyed cing gang 'dod pa de la nan tan byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:19a-4: bskal pa drug cur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:19a-5: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:19a-7: shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:19a-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i smang zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:19a-10: shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:19a-11: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:19b-0: phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor @19b ro; ;sh'a ri'i bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:19b-1: shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi ngos zhes bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:19b-2: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zug rngu med pa'i blo zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:19b-4: shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams phongs pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:19b-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprul pa tshad med par snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:19b-7: shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams gos ka ca linda ltar reg na 'jam pa zhe bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:19b-8: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:19b-10: shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam pa dam pa'i dpal dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:19b-11: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i glang po dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:19b-13: shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:19b-14: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che 'dus pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:19b-16: shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par ma dag pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba yod de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20a-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag @20a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20a-1: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che rtag tu don dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis bskor nas phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20a-4: shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20a-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dag pa thob pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20a-7: shar phyogs na de dag la sogs pa tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20a-8: bus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20a-9: de rnams kyi mtshan nas yongs su brjod cing yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal lo zhes ched du brjod pa la na gsum du brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20a-10: shar phyogs na gang dag snang bar mdzad pa de dag gi mtshan nas yongs su brjod par byas na bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20a-11: lho phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag stong gi tha ma na 'jig rten gyi khams grol ba can na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma zhes @20b bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20b-2: yang gang dag nyi zla sgron ma de'i mtshan nyan cing thos nas kyang dga' ba cher skyed cing mos par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la rnam pa brgya stong du bsams nas pa spu zing zhes byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20b-4: mchi ma'ang blags na rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20b-5: rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bdag cag gis mthong ngo snyam du rtogs par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20b-6: bud med kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla sgron ma de'i mtshan bdag gis thos kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20b-7: bdag gi bud med kyi lus kyi mtha' mar 'gyur ro snyam du sems rab tu dga' bar bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20b-8: de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20b-9: phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyed kyis thos pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20b-10: sems can 'di dag la ji lta ba bzhin du sems can de dag la sgrib par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20b-11: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na gang yod pa de dag kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20b-12: rtsis pa'am rtsis pa chen po sus kyang rtsi ba'am bsdom par bya sla ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:20b-13: 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed du de'i mtshan grags pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu bdud sdig can bar chad byed par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla sgron ma de'i mtshan ji snyed kyis thos shing @21a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21a-1: dad pa'ang rnyed pa de dag gi mthar rtogs par sla ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21a-3: mdo sde 'di lta bu nyan pa'i sems can rnams la 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bdud sdig can rnams kyis bar chad bya ba'i phyir dpung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21a-4: bzhon par bcas pas brtson par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21a-5: de ni sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21a-7: dus phyi ma 'di lta bu 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21a-8: de'i tshe sems can gang mtshan brjod pa'i bsod nams 'di la mos shing dad pa'i sems can de dag ni au dumb'a ra'i me tog dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21a-9: 'jig rten gyi sbyin par 'os par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21a-10: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21a-11: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21a-12: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21a-14: slad ma'i dus na 'di rab tu dka' ba lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21a-15: de na sems can ji snyed cig gis de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla sgron ma de'i mtshan thos par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21a-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyi mtshan kyang thos nas dad pa yang dag par bskyed par 'gyur ba ji snyed cig mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21a-17: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21a-20: gang gis thos par 'gyur ba de dag ngas mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21b-0: de ltar gyi sems can dag mthong @21b bzhin te; sh'a ri'i bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21b-2: da ltar gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun gos ngur smrig bgos pa'i drung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21b-3: khyim pa gos dkar po gyon pa gcig yod pa de bzhin du gang 'di mtshan thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag rnyed par dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21b-4: thos nas kyang dad par 'gyur ba de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21b-6: bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21b-7: gang dag thos nas dad par 'gyur ba de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21b-9: phyi ma'i dus na de dag la rnam par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang me 'bral par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21b-11: 'jig rten thams cad las bye brag tu 'phags par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21b-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dag la brtsams nas chos ston par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21b-13: de dag sems can mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21b-14: chos bstan pa de la'ang gang dag nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21b-15: dad pa yang dag par bskyed par 'gyur ba de dag nga'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bsam pa thag pa nas 'dzin par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21b-16: bskal pa brgyar 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21b-17: yang gang dag dad par mi byed pa de dag kyang ngas mthong ste; dper na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21b-18: da ltar khyod mthong ba bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21b-19: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21b-20: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:21b-21: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan gang dag thos nas de dag dad par mi bgyid cing sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di'ang spong bar bgyid pa de dag la bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po ji tsam du 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22a-5: de dag ni sems can dmyal bar lo bye ba drug cur gnas shing de na sdug bsngal chen po'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22a-7: phyogs gang du bstan pa rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa de na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22a-8: dam pa'i chos spong ba'i skyes bu blun po shin tu mang bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22a-11: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la spong bar mi byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22a-12: rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis dga' ba rgya chen po yang dag par bskyed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22a-13: bdag ni ngan song thams cad las thar to snyam nas ba dan bsgreng bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22a-14: gal te la la zhig gis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22a-16: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po ches gang bar byas nas mtshan 'di mnyan par bya'o zhes de skad zer na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22a-17: des chung du zhig smras pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22a-18: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa la gnas par 'dod pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22a-19: 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed grangs med pa rin po ches yongs su gang bar byas nas mnyan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22b-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu pa na 'jig rten gyi khams @22b tshul khrims kyi 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab ces bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22b-3: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab de'i mtshan thos par 'gyur ba de dag ni tha na rmi lam na'ang 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22b-4: lhag pa'i bsam pa yang dag par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22b-5: de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing chos rnams la'ang rmi lam lta bur myur du rab tu shes par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22b-6: bskal pa brgyad du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga stong pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzugs gser mdog bzang po zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab mngon pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22b-9: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mngon pa'i mtshan thos par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22b-10: mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par 'dzin pa de dag ni bskal pa bcur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22b-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag nyi shu na 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba can zhes bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:22b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23a-0: yang gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'dra ba de'i mtshan nyan @23a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23a-1: cing thos nas kyang tha na se gol gtogs pa tsam yang ri mor bskyed nas yid la byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23a-3: gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dzambu'i chu bo'i gser gyi spang leb bting nas sbyin pa byin pa bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23a-4: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'di yid la byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23a-5: bsod nams kyi phung po 'dis snga ma'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23a-6: rgyu'i bar du gang mi bzod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23a-8: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi sgra ni mthu chen po yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23a-9: gang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa la bsti stang byad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23a-10: mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung la mchod pa byed pa lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23a-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag grangs med pa 'das nas 'jig rten gyi khams stobs kyi shugs thams cad thob pa zhes bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu spos zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spos de byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam 'di ltar btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23a-15: gang bdag gis sangs rgyas la bkur sti byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23a-16: gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa sprin stug po la bdug spos kyi ril bu yungs 'bru tsam bsregs pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23b-0: dge ba'i rtsa ba des bla na med pa yang dag @23b par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23b-1: ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas dri yid du 'ong ba 'byung bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23b-2: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed spos kyi sprin gyis rgyas par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23b-3: gang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can rnams kyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23b-4: dri ma bsnoms shing mtshan kyang thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad byang chub thob pa'i tshe ba spu'i khung bu nas dri yid du 'ong ba 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23b-6: yang dag par blangs pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spos nges par byung ba'i yang dag par blangs pa des nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23b-7: rigs kyi bu mos zhag bdun du zan chad de kha zas ma zos kyang mtshan nyan pa de lta bu ni yon tan yongs su brjod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23b-9: de thos ma thag tu bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23b-10: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23b-11: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spos kyi yon tan brjod pa nyan pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis brjod du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23b-13: de la slad ma'i dus kyi tshe rigs kyi bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23b-14: rigs kyi bu mos de dag thos nas dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:23b-15: rangs pa rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24a-1: bur sangs rgyas kyi chos nyan pa de lta de lta bur bdud sdig can gyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24a-2: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24a-3: 'di ltar de dag sangs rgyas kyis dgongs par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24a-4: de'i tshe de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma spangs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spos kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs gang ci yod pa thams cad ngas khyod la bshad na sems can rnams myos par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24a-8: de dag mtshan thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la mos pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24a-9: dad par 'gyur ba'i bsod nams dang ldan pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24a-13: de bzhin du sems yang dag par dga' bar byed cing bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir ma log pa'o snyam du sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24a-15: bsod nams kyi phung po de'i phyogs tsam zhig bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24a-16: mkhas pa dag ye shes chen po dang ldan par gyur pa dgongs te gsungs pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24a-18: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzed tsam gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bcu rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su gang bar byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24b-0: tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas la bskal pa tshad med nyin re zhing sbyin pa byin pa bas snga ma'i bsod nams kyi @24b phung po'i cha gang du'ang brjod du mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24b-1: gang gis tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la rjes su dran nas yan lag lngas phyag byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ches tshad med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24b-3: de dag bskal pa brgyar 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24b-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu 'das nas 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od dang ldan pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24b-7: gang dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa 'od yongs su dag pa de'i mtshan nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24b-8: se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang byams pa'i sems sgom zhing mngon par dad par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24b-9: mos par byed cing bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24b-10: byams pa'i sems bsgoms pa'i bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang ldan par gyur cig ces tshig 'di skad du smra na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24b-12: de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:24b-14: gang gi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25a-0: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas la nyin re zhing sbyin pa phul @25a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25a-1: ba de bzhin du bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sbyin pa phul ba 'di bas snga ma'i bsod nams kyi phung po la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25a-2: bsod nams kyi phung po 'dis ci'i cha tsam du'ang mi bzod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25a-4: bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas ni byang chub thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25a-7: gang dag chos kyi sbyin pa la 'dzud par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa la dpa' ba de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25a-10: chos kyi sbyin pa mchog la gzud par bya yi zang zing gi sbyin pa la gzud par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25a-11: gang dag skyes bu dam pa de dag la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de dag gis chos kyi sbyin pa nyid sbyin par bya yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25a-12: zang zing gi sbyin pa ni ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25a-13: de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsnyen par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25a-14: bskal pa brgyad cu'i bar du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25a-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag brgya na 'jig rten gyi khams chos ldan zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi bla ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25a-17: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi bla ma de'i mtshan nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25b-1: thal mo sbyor bar byed cing de dag thams cad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25b-3: sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di la chos grub par bya ba'i phyir slob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25b-4: phan yon 'di dag 'dod pas ri mor byas te mos par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa la so so'i skye bo'i shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la tshad gzung bar mi bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25b-6: gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes de ni rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang ma yin pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25b-7: dpe 'di dag thos pa las sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la brnyas par mi bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25b-9: ngag gi las gcig gis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i lus rnam pa du mar 'gyur ba'i las yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba'ang dka'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25b-13: dal ba phul sum sogs pa bsgrub pa'ang shin tu dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25b-14: de'i phyir dpe zhig bstan par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25b-17: sa chen po 'di rgya mtsho chen po gcig tu gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25b-18: de'i nang na gnya' shing bug gcig pa zhig yod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25b-19: rus sbral zhar ba zhig kyang yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25b-20: rgya mtsho chen po de la rlung yar ldang ba mar ldang ba zhes bya ba ldang ba la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:25b-21: rus sbal zhar ba de'ang lo brgya brgya zhing lan gcig phyir 'byung ba rab tu myur bar gnya' shing gi bug gcig pa der /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26a-1: brgya brgya zhing phyir byung ba'i mgul pa chud par smra yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26a-2: log par ltung ba las phyir yang mir 'gyur ba ni de lta ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26a-3: de ltar log par ltung ba rnams kyi mir 'gyur ba rab tu dka' ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26a-4: gang yang mi khom pa la sogs pa spangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26a-5: da ltar mir 'gyur ba thob nas sangs rgyas byung ba la'ang mnyes par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog gi ye shes dam pa mnga' ba la dad pa thob nas bdag gis mir 'gyur ba legs par thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen po dang ldan pa la bdag gis sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang mos par bya'o snyam nas bdag nyid yang dag par dga' bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26a-8: de dag gis bskal pa sum cur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag lnga bcu rtsa ldan 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26a-12: gang de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po'i mtshan nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26a-13: dad pa bskyed par 'gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26a-14: mos par byed cing thal mo sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26b-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag @26b 'tshal lo zhes zer na de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26b-1: de'i phyogs tsam zhig bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26b-3: gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la nyin re zhing sbyin pa phul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26b-4: de bzhin du 'bul zhing lo stong du phul ba bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26b-5: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos nas dad pa yang dag par bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26b-6: mos par byed cing thal mo sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26b-7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad du smra ba 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po la snga ma'i bsod nams kyi phung pos brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26b-8: dper yang mi bzod de; bskal pa sum cur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26b-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu na 'jig rten gyi khams bden pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:26b-12: gang de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan chen po de'i mtshan nyid par 'gyur ba nges pa la zhugs pa ma gtogs par de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad grub par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27a-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag @27a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27a-1: brgyad na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa spos 'od byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i ming gang gis nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27a-6: thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27a-7: de dag phyi ma la ngan song du 'gro bar ma gyur cig ces smon lam de ltar btab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan gang nyan cing thos nas kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27a-10: lhag pa'i bsam pas mos par byed pa ni sngon gyi smon lam des de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27a-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sum cu na 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro de'i mtshan thos par 'gyur ba nyung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27b-0: dad par @27b 'gyur ba de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27b-1: gang nyan par mi byed pa de dag ni bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po tshad med pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27b-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bco lnga na 'jig rten khams kun tu dga' ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od tshad med ces bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27b-5: gang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od tshad med de'i mtshan nyan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27b-6: lhag pa'i bsam pas dad par byed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'od thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27b-7: gang dad par mi byed pa de dag bskal pa nyi shur tsha ba'i sems can dmyal bar btso bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag nyi shu na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od btang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27b-12: gang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od btang ba de'i mtshan nyan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27b-13: thos ma thag tu'ang dad pa skyed par byed pa de dag thams cad bdud sdig can gyis thub par dka' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:27b-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyis stong lnga brgya na 'jig rten gyi khams spug gi shing tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28a-1: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28a-3: yang gang de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i sgron ma de'i mtshan nyan par 'gyur ba de dag lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28a-4: de dag yul gang na gnas pa'i yul de'ang mchod rten du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28a-6: phyi ma'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyan par 'gyur ba'i skyes bu dam pa de dag ni dkon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag brgyad na 'jig rten gyi khams dri mchog ces bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28a-10: gang de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od de mtshan nyan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28a-11: tha na rmi lam gyi tshe thos na'ang dad pa yang dag par skyed pa de dag thams cad bsod nams kyi phung po chen por skyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28a-12: ri dang 'dra bar bdud thams cad kyis mi bskyod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28a-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu gnyis na 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na ngan song gi gzhi med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i @28b smon lam sngon 'di ltar btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28b-1: byang chub thob pa'i mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28b-2: mya ngan las 'das pa thos pa de dag thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28b-3: bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa'ang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28b-4: da ltar gyi bdag gi ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28b-6: gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba snang ba'i mtshan nyan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ji ltar smon lam btab pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bco brgyad na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi nor bu snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28b-10: gang de bzhin gshegs pa me 'od kyi mtshan nyan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad chos kyi sgron ma thogs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28b-12: sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28b-13: de dag gi nyin mtshan sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pas 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28b-14: de dag chos kyi sbyin pa mngon par gtong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28b-15: de dag ni bdud thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:28b-16: mu stegs can gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:29a-1: rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu na 'jig rten gyi khams gzugs snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:29a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:29a-3: ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de gzugs snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:29a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams der sems can gang su dag skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:29a-5: skye ba dang; skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad mi'i kha dog las 'das par 'gyur ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:29a-6: sems can de dag thams cad gzugs bzang zhing mdzes par 'gyur ba yin no; ;sh'a ri'i bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:29a-7: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba'i mtshan nyan pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis gzugs bzang por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-068-001:29a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu gsum na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te /
